website_summaries.verdict: Nice quality for a fast-pitch softball offered at a reasonable price point.
pros: NFHS-approved fast-pitch softball that features a high-quality leather cover
Raised red seams give fast-pitch pitchers the quality grip they're seeking

customer_reviews.title: It sounds a bit mushy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have the same pop like the dream seam balls. It's a bit more mushy. That makes difference in practice if you have both brands of balls in your bucket.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Great ball!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 dozen for my daughter’s 12u travel team. They gave held up great over 100s of BP practice, even rotating through with my college player and fiends. The seams and comfort also seem to win over my daughter in her pitching practice
customer_reviews.author: CRoll381

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great softballs for practice. Good seams for pitchers and firm enough for hitting. Have not deformed over 2 months of travel ball practice.
customer_reviews.author: M. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: They get a bit warped after we use them for batting practice like any ball does
customer_reviews.text: 3rd time this year I've ordered a dozen of these. My daughter is a pitcher and we use them a lot. They get a bit warped after we use them for batting practice like any ball does. A really good ball for the price.
customer_reviews.author: astapp

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought two dozen as our team is moving to the 12” balls this fall. After two fielding practices (on turf) and three hitting practices in an indoor cage they are still in good shape and I am pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Milomilo1375

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ball and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent leather softballs that hold up very well. For the price, you can't beat this deal!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great balls. I use it for practice with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great balls. I use it for practice with my co-Ed teammates. We use it for batting practice, ground ball exercises and out field exercises. So far, it's holding up pretty good. The big guys on the team loves to hit them. I like them because of the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Henry T

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had a small issue, sent them an email and they more than made up for the issue. Fast shipping and great customer service. The balls have very nice raised stitching. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Brian stamper

customer_reviews.title: buy them
customer_reviews.text: very nice softballs. My 12u uses for pitching lessons/practice. nice seams.
customer_reviews.author: chachi

customer_reviews.title: these are great
customer_reviews.text: professional feel, great seams, and hold up to all abuse!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W Hai

customer_reviews.title: Good price for leather
customer_reviews.text: At $50 for a dozen this is a good price for leather cover balls. Also you don't see these in the brick and mortar stores so helps to differentiate your ball from someone elses's.
customer_reviews.author: KEG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Holding up great, perfect for 1st time picther needing defined threads for grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great balls pitcher like the raised seam any the hit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great balls pitcher like the raised seam any the hit like the pop when the ball comes off the bat
customer_reviews.author: charlescox28

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was great. I teach girls softball pitching lessons and these balls wear very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Simon

customer_reviews.title: Softballs are real leather and there is a good amount of life before they start to rip at ...
customer_reviews.text: Softballs are real leather and there is a good amount of life before they start to rip at the seams. They do scuff easily if hit into an asphalt or concrete (foul balls)
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Been using these balls for about 3 weeks. So ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using these balls for about 3 weeks. So far they are holding up VERY well. No warping no egg shape even with hard hitting.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good to practice pitching and throwing. The leather is super thin. If they hit the fence they will rip.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality practice ball
customer_reviews.text: I actually expected less than what I got quality wise. It's a great ball for practice. Would recommend it to any softball coach out there
customer_reviews.author: Javier Larraga

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but this batch was not durable
customer_reviews.text: The softballs arrived in good shape. However after one game a majority of them would develop 1/2 in or so rips around the seams in various locations. Also the ink bled pretty bad as well. Probably just a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: John Koeppen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with raised seams.
customer_reviews.text: The ball quality seems good so far but haven't used them much yet. Seams are raised enough for pitching.
customer_reviews.author: Jay P.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: These game day balls did not last 1 game. So far 9 out of 12 split or have chunks out of them and didnt even last one day of use. Not happy at all with the purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennae McQuivey

customer_reviews.title: these ball were perfect.. too bad my girls already hit 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: these ball were perfect.. too bad my girls already hit 5 over fence and got lost,,, will order some more soon
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, girls really like using these balls, pitchers love them due to their great grip.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 12 balls, and on each one the leather ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 12 balls, and on each one the leather around the seams split after 2 weeks use. The split was about two inches long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quailty
customer_reviews.text: I coach a travel team of 13 and 14 year old girls and after 2 practices I have a few balls ripping at the seams, tears in the covers. I know these aren't the most expensive but I figured I could get through the summer with them.
customer_reviews.author: Don Grau

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice balls. Good grip and have held up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cover but splits in seams with continuous hitting. Good pitching ball.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great batting practice balls. I use them mainly indoors but have had no problem outside.
customer_reviews.author: pcupgr

customer_reviews.title: X100 Softballs
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with price, timeline of receiving and quality of softballs. I will buy more of these X100's. These are new in box poly graphite cores. Have used now for a few weeks. Holding up fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: RdSRgS

customer_reviews.title: Do not but these for BP
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed with these . After 20 min of BP with my u14 team they managed to split the cover on all 36 of the balls. All in the same spot right by the seams
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Hoskinson

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: have used these balls for 2 years now with my 12u team. They have good grip and a nice raised seam for my pitchers and have held up extremely well. Haven't experienced any rips/tears in the covers and none of them have started to feel soft, still have good pop off of the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Shyababy

customer_reviews.title: Total crap! Do not buy these
customer_reviews.text: These balls split at the seems after 1 day of use! Total crap! Do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Superb balls
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been superb balls. I have 2 teen girls that are beasts on the field. These balls have served us well. No splits and a nice price. I found them on sale as a lighting deal but will be buying more for the next season
customer_reviews.author: MOM OF 4

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent. Craftsmanship is also great. No problem for using for both pitching, batting, and fielding. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleMariners

customer_reviews.title: See picture
customer_reviews.text: First time use, pitching only, hits the driveway once and exterior scrapes off. I won’t be buying theae again. Cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Frodo

customer_reviews.title: And we decided to go with this brand because we have heard good things about it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed some practice balls for hitting off the tee at home. And we decided to go with this brand because we have heard good things about it. So far we haven't had any issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: This is my second dozen I have purchased. No ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second dozen I have purchased. No problems so far. We use them in or batting cage and two to three times a week and hold up as well as any other we use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice balls at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice balls at a great price. We use these for pitching, fielding, and hitting practice. I ordered another dozen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like the softballs and our team enjoys the sport. They seem to be good quality. They are easy to throw.
customer_reviews.author: David A. McBrier

customer_reviews.title: Iz Good ya
customer_reviews.text: For the price a great leather covered ball. Seems to be holding up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Bad bitch

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Got them for our weekly pickup game. Played an entire game with one ball, hit it hard, over and over again, in the rain and mud. The ball came out looking new, with no loss of shape or soft spots. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lebowitz

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. They are for my oldest daughter for pitching and batting practice. The stitches are big which allow for a good grip. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These have been perfect for my daughter to use when practicing her pitching. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rredeck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These balls held up well, I used them three times a week all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Used for indoor pitching practice sessions have been great. This is our second order for the same ball. Great price and great performance.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J. Tigani

customer_reviews.title: These are the worst balls I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have coached fastpitch softball for 15 years. These are the worst balls I have ever purchased!! Used them approx 4 times in practice and the covers on many balls are tearing and ripping.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dunham

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two dozen of these and received only one ball total.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good balls
customer_reviews.text: Good for pitching coach but they don't last long when bouncing on concrete
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

product_meta.title: MacGregor NFHS Fast Pitch Softball, 12-inch (One Dozen)
product_meta.description: Pitchers can send challenging fastballs flying to home plate with the MacGregor® 12 in. NFHS Fast-Pitch Softballs. Outfielders are able to track fly balls with ease thanks to the yellow cover, and the contrast created by the red stitching helps batters identify the pitch as it's hurled toward the dish. Keep the dugout stocked for the whole season ahead, as the poly graphite core and leather cover are designed to withstand hits with more force than a bunt or slap.
feature_bullets: Poly graphite center, .47/375 lb. max comp
